heading: 3.4 Research Infrastructure Services
text: Washington University Information Technology’s Research Infrastructure Services mission facilitate discovery knowledge enhance educational opportunities providing secure, sustainable, scalable, integrated research technology services collaborative diverse environment.

heading: 3.4.1 Data Storeage Platform
text: Data Storage Platform scalable, high-performance distributed storage infrastructure integrated long-term archiving capabilities. many enterprise level features facilitate data analysis, management, curation retention. faculty involved research access 5TB free Active storage.
